column1: Luancheng (simplified Chinese: 栾城; traditional Chinese: 欒城; pinyin: Luánchéng) is a town in and the seat of Luancheng County
column4: about 20 km (12 mi) south of the provincial capital of Shijiazhuang along China National Highway 308. As of 2011
column5: it has 47 villages under its administration.

column1: The city is served by the Shijiazhuang Luancheng Airport (IATA: LCT).
